title: Sound On: Rep. Malliotakis, SALT Repeal, Russia
itunes:title: Sound On: Rep. Malliotakis, SALT Repeal, Russia
description:
Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Michael Gordon, Principal of Group Gordon and former DOJ spokesperson for the Clinton administration, and Rep. Nicole Malliotakis, a Republican representing New York's 11th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
